amendment.description: To repeal or reduce the estate tax, but only if done in a fiscally responsible way.

vote.text: Amendment SA 693 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 80 - 19. Record Vote Number: 66.

action.text: Amendment SA 693 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Warner.
